Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory56.jpg'}
{3: 'Darkness slowly fades away, and you find yourself inside a house of Golden Age style. Someone is knocking on the door.'}
{2: '(Open the door)', 3: '5'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Child', 3: 'Trick or treat!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Child', 3: "What Evan? I ain't no Evan!", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm sorry, you look like someone I know.", 3: '10', 4: "What's your name then?", 5: '11'}
{2: 'Child', 3: "It's okay. My name is Tom!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Child', 3: 'My name is Tom!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tom', 3: 'Alright, trick or treat!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'The kid said the same line again in a natural and childish way.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: "Looks like he won't easily give up if you don't give him some candy."}
{2: 'Alright, you wait right here.', 3: '16', 4: 'How about I give you 5 Black Cards, and you buy it yourself?', 5: '17'}
{2: 'Tom', 3: 'What\'s that "Black Card" thingy? I want real money!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You feel a little strange, but right now... You can only get some candies to send the kid away.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You searched in the house, but there was no candy.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'The knocking has started again. Looks like Ev... Tom is getting impatient.'}
{2: '(Keep searching)', 3: '23', 4: '(Open the door)', 5: '24'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You looked through every corner of the room, but still had no luck.'}
{3: 'Before you push the door open, you suddenly hear a voice from behind.'}
{3: '"Don\'t open the door."'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: "But it's too late. The door is already open."}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Outside the door is a creepy, gigantic shadow. It is so large that it can cover the entire door.'}
{2: '(Prepare for self defense)', 3: '30', 4: 'Cosplay nowadays looks really good, huh?', 5: '37'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: "The shadow walks toward you, mumbling something that you cannot understand. You can't help but take a few steps back."}
{2: 'Narration', 3: "The shadow follows you into the room. You don't have much space left."}
{2: '(Try to throw something at it)', 3: '33', 4: '(Keep moving back)', 5: '33'}
{3: 'Your action is futile. You have no choice.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Here you are, Commandant... Wow, this costume is so cool!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tom', 3: "Oh c'mon, I only want some candies. Why so much trouble?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Someone inside the shadow pushes its head away. You see Ev... Tom's head."}
{3: "The shadow suddenly shrinks, revealing Tom's body."}
{2: 'Tom', 3: 'So where are my candies?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory78.jpg'}
{3: 'After discussing with others, you end up taking Tom to a grocery store not far away, so you can buy him some candies while checking the surroundings.'}
{3: 'Seeing that Lee just happens to have some "collection" of old notes and coins.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shop Owner', 3: 'Here you are, licorice and twisters.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: 'Hey you, young man! The one in blue!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: "You should treat your money nicely. Look at this note. It's horrible!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: "You're lucky that you can still use it. Otherwise, Lil' Tom won't get his candies.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: "Hey, Lil' Tom!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: "Curfew's coming soon. Go home after eating your candies! Don't let your mom worry.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: "If I ever see you hanging around before curfew, I'll tell your sheriff dad!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'What curfew?', 3: '62'}
{3: 'After hearing the question, the shop owner—who looks a lot like Staessen—looks at you suspiciously.'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: "You guys... aren't local, are you? Where are you from?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Um, we are... University students from another place. We're here for Halloween... Haha...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: 'Youngsters... Alright. The curfew in this town starts from 10pm until 6am next morning. Nobody is allowed to leave home during this time.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'We just walked around the town, I thought this place was fairly safe?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: 'Better listen to the old man. Last year, there was also a group of uni students...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The shop owner suddenly realizes something and does not finish the line.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Ok, there was a group of students last year. What happened to them?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shop Owner', 3: '...Well, just stay inside the house during curfew. Life is beautiful, you know what I mean?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Are you saying that...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Thanks, we got it. We'll go back right now!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: "You bid farewell to Lil' Tom and left the grocery store."}
{2: '(Where have you been?)', 3: '79'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We were dropped in the nearby mountain. We had to use our built-in GPS to find one another.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "After gathering, we realized Commandant wasn't with us, so we searched along the road until we got here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's get back to the topic...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Something isn't right with this town.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I think so too. Why don't we explore this place before the curfew starts?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Who cares about the curfew? We just need to run to the mountain, no way they can catch us!', 4: '2'}
